item.title: .net orm
item.description: SqlSugar nuget 安装 SqlSugar 安装 MySql.Data 实体类 [SugarTable("IMMenu")] class IMMenu { [SugarColumn(IsPrimaryKey = true, IsIdentity = true)] //id public int id { get; set; } public string name { get; set; } // 其他属性... public override string ToString() { return $"id: {id}, name: {name}"; } } 使用 // 连接字符串 string connectionString = "server=xxx;user=root;password=xxx;database=DB"; // 创建SqlSugar客户端实例 SqlSugarClient db = new SqlSugarClient(new ConnectionConfig() { ConnectionString = connectionString, DbType = DbType.MySql, IsAutoCloseConnection = true, InitKeyType = InitKeyType.
